comment.author: jcviau
comment.text:
Pull request : https://github.com/castleproject/Core/pull/25
Tested with the same application as the one attached in this defect (with a patched Castle.Core)
We will build our own version of 3.2 with this fix since we were stuck with 2.5 and we wanted to upgrade for multiple fix (leak, proxy caching). Also, we are stuck with .Net 3.5 since the platform where our application run does not support .Net 4.0+ and we have no idea if there will be a 3.3 release that still support .net 3.5 (from my understanding, .net 3.5 wont be supported in next release 4.0).
